Package cams.posts.post_entities

Class Post

java.lang.Object
cams.posts.post_entities.Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Post extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a post. A post is associated with a camp and contains various messages. Object is Serializable.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Post

      public Post()
      Constructor for Post.

  • Method Details

    • addContent

      public void addContent(Message message)
      Adds a message to the post's content.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message to be added to the post.

    • getContent

      public List<Message> getContent()
      Retrieves all messages associated with the post.
      Returns:
      A list of Message objects in the post.

    • getFirstMessage

      public Message getFirstMessage()
      Retrieves the first message in the post.
      Returns:
      The first Message in the post, or null if the post has no messages.

    • displayContent

      public void displayContent()
      Displays the content of the post.

      Prints out the name of the associated camp and the content of each message.

    • isReplied

      public Boolean isReplied()
      Checks if the post has received any replies.
      Returns:
      true if the post has more than one message, indicating a reply, false otherwise.

    • getCampName

      public String getCampName()
      Retrieves the name of the camp associated with the post.
      Returns:
      The name of the camp.

    • setCamp

      public void setCamp(String campName)
      Sets the camp associated with the post.

      Throws an exception if attempting to change the camp for a post that already has a camp.

      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to associate with the post.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the post already has an associated camp.
